title: Rab and his friends and other dogs and men,
author: Brown, John
snippet: It was to Colinton House he was going that afternoon. As we drove along, sometimes there were long silences, then gleams of the veriest nonsense and fun, and then perhaps some true words of far- stretching meaning.

title: The journal of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: line. He died at Colinton House on April 17th, health and weather shall determine, for if I
